dt: {bc}a small knobby prominence or excrescence especially on a plant or animal {bc}{sx|nodule||}: such as
{bc}a protuberance near the head of a rib that articulates with the transverse process of a vertebra
{bc}any of several prominences in the central nervous system
{bc}a small abnormal discrete lump in the substance of an organ or in the skin

shortdef: a small knobby prominence or excrescence especially on a plant or animal : nodule: such as
a protuberance near the head of a rib that articulates with the transverse process of a vertebra
any of several prominences in the central nervous system
